mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NOTI_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NOTI_END_DATE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH24:MI') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,CASE WHEN SYSDATE >= LAST_UPDATE_DATE + 7 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS NEW_IMG FROM ITSM_IS_NOTICE_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROWNUM < 4 ORDER BY LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT A.SEQ_ID AS SEQ ,A.TITLE ,A.NOTI_FLAG ,TO_CHAR(A.NOTI_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NOTI_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.NOTI_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NOTI_END_DATE ,A.CONTENTS ,A.CREATED_BY FROM ITSM_IS_NOTICE_INFO A WHERE A.SEQ_ID = #{p_seq_id}
